captions.text:
- [Voiceover] If you're on the
beach, this is what you want.
You don't any of that Bud Light shit.

- Um, it doesn't really
taste like anything,

- The entire flavor lasts
for about 15 seconds

- There's like a pee vibe
I'm getting on this one.
This is like a little cider-y.

- Bud Light is a little
aggressive compared to this.

- To be honest, to me, this
does not taste good at all.
- This is like a Mexican Guinness.
- This tastes sort of the same.

- I like that one.
- Yeah, it's caramel-y.
- This is like the chode of beer bottles.

- Unfortunately you can't be
classy when you open this beer.

Talk about making you angry
when you're supposed to be

- I'm not saying
cigarettes are cool, kids,

'cause they're not, but I'm
just saying, the badassery
that comes with it is here in a Modelo.

- [Voiceover] I was gonna
use the bottle opener,
- I like see it, and I trust it.
- [Voiceover] You trust it, it's like a...
That's the smoothest one we've had so far.
- You were hyping it up so much!
- This one's more bitter than the others.
- This tastes like nothing to me.

- That's a nice beer.
- That's a good beer!
- It's a tie between Corona and Modelo.

- [Voiceover] Yeah, it was
the best one, for sure.
- If I'm like already really drunk,

But this one tastes like
cider, so I'm a big fan.

- I like Modelo 'cause it
actually tastes like beer.
- I like Victoria; I like the name of it.

- I know why Corona's the
most popular Mexican beer.
It really does taste the best.
Oh no it's not, it's yours.

- Why are these bottles...
- We're cheersing!

comments.text:
Corona, Modelo, and Victoria are very decent beers, because they are from 
Grupo Modelo. Indio, Sol, and Tecate come from Cervecería Cuahutémoc 
Moctezuma, and those aren't very good. They left out really good ones, like 
Pacífico, León, Noche Buena, Bohemia, and Dos Equis!... That afroamerican 
lady was right in every single one! Haha.﻿
